info.title: Copying files and directories with rsync locally

abstract.para: You can copy files within the same machine using rsync if you have write permission for the destination location.

topic.para: To copy the file backup.tar.xz to the location /var/backup/, use the command rsync -avz backup.tar.xz /var/backup/.
The file backup.tar.xz is copied to /var/backup/, and the absolute path is/var/backup/backup.tar.xz.
